articles.name: BUSINESS SITE
articles.info: A simple business site for a fictional cat subscription. Where you can look at products, read articles about cats and also send in a form with details of your subscription request. For a fun flare i added a JavaScript party mode toggle and a clickable talking cat in the footer.
